data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Kowloon City, Hong Kong need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kowloon City, Hong Kong
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Kowloon City, Hong Kong a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Kowloon City, Hong Kong so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Kowloon City access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 362,500 citizens of the the state of Kowloon City.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Kowloon City.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 22,186 believers in Kowloon City to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kowloon City, Hong Kong has a population of 362,500.

We estimate Kowloon City has 22,186 people who might know Jesus, 25,249 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 315,065 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
